title: 'Guardian' Editor: Edward Snowden 'Deserves Respect'
teaser: Alan Rusbridger, former editor-in-chief of the Guardian, was the man who decided to publish Edward Snowden's stolen data. NPR's Scott Simon speaks with Rusbridger about how Snowden will be remembered.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
